meanings.definition: The state or quality of being notable or distinguished.
meanings.sent1: In our small town, the notabilities are easily recognized for their kindness and generosity.
meanings.sent2: The event was attended by various notabilities from the world of politics and entertainment.
meanings.sent3: The notabilities at the charity gala were so popular that they had to take turns signing autographs.
meanings.sent4: Her elegant dress made her stand out like a notability among a sea of ordinary outfits.
meanings.sent5: The notabilities in the history books are remembered for their remarkable achievements and contributions.

meanings.definition: People who are notable or distinguished.
meanings.sent1: The notabilities in the room attracted attention with their confident demeanor.
meanings.sent2: The magazine cover featured all the notabilities of the fashion industry.
meanings.sent3: The notabilities at the award ceremony were joking around and having a great time.
meanings.sent4: She stood out among the crowd like a notability shining brightly in the spotlight.
meanings.sent5: The notabilities in the community were respected for their leadership and positive influence.
